posts.caption: PIC Microcontroller Course
posts.description:
Do you like to learn the pic microcontrollers programming with easy languages?!
Do you like to design and implement microcontroller's applications and projects?! 
Did you try to enter the field of the embedded systems design?!

Course outlines:
1-What is the microcontroller? 
2-Features of BASIC language and its FUNCTIONS. 
3-I/O put and shifting operations with several examples. 
4-interfacing with display devises ( lcd –seven segments) with examples. 
5-Debounce troubleshooting.
6-Timers(timer 0 ,timer 1), hardware interrupt with examples. 
7-Analog to digital conversion and digital to analog conversion with examples.
8-PWM (pulse width modulation) and the Keypad with examples.
9-Universal synchronous asynchronous serial communication (RS232) .
10- EEPROM memory with examples. 
11- I2C protocol and interfacing with the external memory with examples . 
12-Sound with PIC with examples.
13-Flying to program with C language using MikroC .
       - Basics of C language . 
       - LCD Interfacing. - 
       - Serial communications with examples.
       - Keypad and 7 Segment interfacing with examples.
       - ADC with examples. - Interrupts (timer0 and timer1).
       - Mixing assembly and C languages.
14- EXCITING PROJECTS WITH PIC : 
            -Security system based on the keypad . 
            -DC MOTOR CONTROL. 
            -Sony remote control decoding and controlling. 
            -STEPPER MOTOR CONTROL. 
            -TEMPERATURE CONTROL. 
            -DIGITAL real time CLOCK. 
            - Digital voltmeter. 
            -Frequency meter.  
(Practical training from A to z on real kits)
* you can see videos for our training activities :
http://esd-courses.weebly.com/media-corner.html
website:http://esd-courses.weebly.com
E-mail:contact.us.micro@gmail.com
Tele:+201113044833 ------ 02/24056479 
Duration: 36 hr.                           Price : 450 le for the Egyptian student 
* enjoy by our 10% discount
*for Registration
